simplesect.title: Overview
simplesect.para: Jalopy is a source code formatter for the Sun Java programming language. It layouts any valid Java source code according to some widely configurable rules; to meet a certain coding style without putting a formatting burden on individual developers.
With Jalopy you will be able to transform any foreign coding style to your own preferences, without any browbeating or bloodletting.
